name: Pittsburgh River Escape
description: Picture this, you are on the Allegheny river and your sail boat is crippled, you must try to avoid colliding with an even faster boat that keeps trying to ram into you. The game will pick up speed the longer you survive. This is my first attempt at making Gameboy game so it's fairly bad. I owe my utmost thanks to the channel "GamingMonsters" on youtube for the tutorials on GBDK. This can be played on an emulator or any flashcart.
